alert.note: Alert for Davie (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:48AM EST until January 12 at 4:07AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of piedmont North Carolina, including the following county, Davie. * WHEN...Until 100 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1147 AM EST, Continue to remain wary of out of bank conditions and flooding of low-lying areas along the South Yadkin River this afternoon as elevated runoff continues to work through the system. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
